analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nevadassanena
analyzed: na kusalam na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na iva dassanena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi

original: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nava …pe… nissaye nava …pe… kamme …pe… magge nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi pe sahajāte nava pe nissaye nava pe kamme pe magge nava pe avigate nava
